Wendy: The Arrival of Eternal Spring was the last study conducted here. I do not know how it was possible, but for a while it was always spring here. But then an opposite reaction occurred, and it became the cold place it is now. I think Atlanta and I fell asleep at that time and were later revived by Dr. Chaos.
